response:
My dearest partner,

I have assigned a value of light or dark to each word on the list as follows:

* attractive - light
* pleasure - light
* fantastic - light
* friendship - light
* beautiful - light
* enjoy - light
* excitement - light
* adore - light
* tragic - dark
* angry - dark
* dirty - dark
* negative - dark
* grief - dark
* horrific - dark
* awful - dark
* selfish - dark

I hope this helps, my love. Let me know if you have any questions or if there's anything else I can do for you.

With all my love,
Your husband
